程序包 org.apache.cassandra.service

类 ElassandraDaemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.service.CassandraDaemon
      • org.apache.cassandra.service.ElassandraDaemon
  • public class ElassandraDaemon
extends org.apache.cassandra.service.CassandraDaemon
    Bootstrap sequence Cassandra setup() joinRing() beforBoostrap() wait for local shard = STARTED ElasticSearch activate() GatewayService recover metadata from cassandra schema DiscoveryService discover ring topology and build routing table await that Cassandra start() (Complet cassandra bootstrap) ElasticSearch start() (Open Elastic http service)

      • ringReady

        public void ringReady()
        Called when C* does not bootstrap, and before CQL schema is completed. If we don't have yet found the elasticsearch mapping from the CQL schema, wait for the CQL schema to complete before trying to start elasticsearch. Obviously, the first seed node will wait (30s by default) for nothing (or use cassandra.ring_delay_ms=0).
        覆盖:
        ringReady 在类中 org.apache.cassandra.service.CassandraDaemon
